translation.APP_DESCRIPTION: Basic task app made with React, Material UI and Firebase.
translation.APP_AUTH_FEEDBACK_ERROR_AUTH: An error occurred Authenticating with Firebase!
translation.APP_AUTH_FEEDBACK_ERROR_RECENT_LOGIN: To delete your account, your last login should be recent. Login with your account and try again.
translation.APP_SHARE_LABEL_SHARED_LINK: Anyone with this link can see your tasks.
translation.APP_WARNING_TASK_NO_TAG: You have tasks without tags. To see them, uncheck all options in the tags filter.
translation.APP_WARNING_LOCAL_MODE: You're using the app in local mode. To access your tasks in another device, create an account.
